thread.title: Jim Delany on Rutgers coach Kyle Flood: "He's paid his price" and now that is "resolved"

title: Jim Delany on Rutgers coach Kyle Flood: "He's paid his price" and now that is "resolved"
text:

Join the Conversation CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
NEW BRUNSWICK Recent controversies at Rutgers have not shaken Big Ten commissioner Jim Delany’s faith in the leadership at the conference’s second-year member school. 
Considered one of the most powerful leaders in college athletics, Delany spoke to a select group of reporters Friday night before watching the Rutgers women’s volleyball game. He is in town to watch the Rutgers football team face No. 4 Michigan State at 8 p.m. Saturday night. 
“If they wanted my opinion, I would give it to them,” Delany said when asked if he is advising Rutgers in its time of turmoil. “They haven’t asked for my opinion. And I’m not sure that my opinion is all that different than everybody else’s opinion. Jim Delany on @RutgersU campus: Ive got plenty of confidence in #Rutgers leadership http://t.co/MH1cv766fE#RFootball#CHOPNation@RFootball— Ryan Dunleavy (@rydunleavy) October 9, 2015
